Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24

Package model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameModel
    This is the interfaces that defines the game as the target for the methods of the Game State Machine
    GameObserver
    This interface defines the methods implemented from all views to states change in the Game model
    StateIdentifier
    The interface implemented by every enum that lists a set of names for the FSM States
    TurnObserver
    The interface implemented by each class that is observer of the Turn State
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    a 5x5 board where most of the Game takes place
    Builder
    a pawn of a Player
    ErrorMessage
    contains specific error messages that can be thrown
    Game
    A match at the game "Santorini" between two or three Player
    Player
    participant in a Game
    Square
    A single square in the game Board
    Turn
    This class represents a Turn of the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Game.State
    an identifier for the game phase
    Outcome
    Represents all possible statuses of a player
    Turn.State
    The list of names of the different States in the Turn State Machine
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateNameException
    This class represents the Exception thrown when the instance of an object with a name is already present where it should not be
